## Learning Objectives

After completing this module you will be able to: 

- <u>Explore</u> common data repositories
- <u>Use</u> Google search operators to more effectively perform general searches
- <u>Define</u> fundamental properties of effective data management plans
- <u>Create</u> a data management plan
- <u>Describe</u> best practices for documenting data for archiving
